text:
Ifor Huw Irranca-Davies (' Davies; born 22 January 1963) is a Welsh Labour and Co-operative politician. He has been the Member of the Senedd for Ogmore since 2016. He was also the Member of Parliament (MP) for Ogmore from 2002 to 2016.
Irranca-Davies was born in Gowerton, Swansea. He was named after his step great-uncle, Ifor Davies, also a Welsh Labour politician. On marriage, he and wife Joanna Irranca both changed their surnames to Irranca-Davies.
